Japan Mortality Rates for life table construction

Source: R/data.R
demoJapan.Rd

Two yearly mortality rates for each age

data(demoJapan)

Format

A data frame with 110 observations on the following 3 variables.

JP8587M

Male life table

JP8587F

Female life table

age

Attained age

Source

SOA mortality web site

Details

Dowloaded in 2012 from Society of Actuaries (SOA) mortality table web site

Examples

data(demoJapan)
head(demoJapan)
#>   age JP8587M JP8587F
#> 1   0 0.00137 0.00126
#> 2   1 0.00098 0.00094
#> 3   2 0.00067 0.00065
#> 4   3 0.00048 0.00044
#> 5   4 0.00039 0.00030
#> 6   5 0.00036 0.00023
